article.title: MDA Modifies X-band Radar Contract with Boeing
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Missile Defense Agency is announcing the award of a sole-source cost-plus-fixed-fee modification under contract HQ0147-09-C-0007 to exercise an option to The Boeing Company, Huntsville, Alabama The total value of this award is $15,092,298. Under this modification, Boeing will continue performing operation and sustainment services for the Sea Based X-band Radar. The Missile Defense Agency, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
